tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  behavior VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  customer_age INT,
  customer_gender VARCHAR(10),
  customer_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE PurchaseHistory (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  purchase_date DATE,
  purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  product_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
  demographic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  income DECIMAL,
  education_level VARCHAR(50),
  occupation VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE preferences (
  preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  favorite_color VARCHAR(50),
  favorite_food VARCHAR(100),
  preferred_brand VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    demo_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    income INT,
    education VARCHAR(50),
    job_title VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE behaviors (
    behavior_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    website_visits INT,
    purchase_history INT,
    subscription_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE preferences (
    pref_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    preferred_product VARCHAR(50),
    marketing_channel VARCHAR(50),
    email_opt_in BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Demographics (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    income DECIMAL(10, 2),
    education_level VARCHAR(20),
    employment_status VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Behaviors (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    browsing_history TEXT,
    purchase_history TEXT,
    interaction_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE Preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    marketing_email BOOLEAN,
    sms_notifications BOOLEAN,
    preferred_products TEXT
)
